Topic.Title: Easy way to change WEAR to EQUIP ??? (Solved)

Posts.EditableText: Or do i need to create a new command that is called equip :O
Posts.HTML: Or do i need to create a new command that is called equip :O

Posts.EditableText:
Not sure. I always just jury-rigged my own custom 'wear-equip-unequip' code rather than relying on Quest's inbuilt.

I'm not sure you'd need to create an entire new function. Maybe a new /verb/ at most?
Posts.HTML:
Not sure. I always just jury-rigged my own custom 'wear-equip-unequip' code rather than relying on Quest's inbuilt.

I'm not sure you'd need to create an entire new function. Maybe a new /verb/ at most?

Posts.EditableText:
On the desktop version, I believe you can edit the core commands. Just change the pattern, everything else can stay the same.

You might also want to override the function `_SetVerbsForGarment`, which adds "Wear" and "Remove" to an object's inventoryverbs based on whether it's worn or not.
Posts.HTML:
On the desktop version, I believe you can edit the core commands. Just change the pattern, everything else can stay the same.

You might also want to override the function _SetVerbsForGarment, which adds "Wear" and "Remove" to an object's inventoryverbs based on whether it's worn or not.
